title: Citibank letterhead design
description: Citibank logo at top right with Citibank in orange text and a circle with a four-pointed star inside following. Under this a thin dark line runs the almost the width of the page. Under this line at the far left: Citibank N.A./ 55 Wall Street/ New York, N.Y. 10015. To the right of this: Pamela P. Flaherty/ Vice President.
name: Print
